Contents.Subtitle: Settings at first installation
Contents.Intro: When installing poetry on the machine for the first time, these commands are usually handy to set venv and project at the root of the local repository.

Cheats.Explanation: Create virtual environment for python in .venv folder of the local repository.

Contents.Subtitle: Use other python version than the default global
Contents.Intro: The other python version needs to be already installed in the machine for this to work.

Cheats.Explanation: Create just the venv using another python version. No dependencies are yet installed.
